menu.name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomato puree; cook until oil separates.
Add garam masala, salt and paneer cubes; simmer 5 minutes.
Stir in cream, cook 2 more minutes and serve hot with naan or rice.

menu.name: Masala Dosa
instructions: Heat oil, crackle mustard seeds, add curry leaves and onions; sauté until soft.
Add turmeric and mashed potatoes, mix and season with salt.
Spread dosa batter thin on a hot griddle, place potato filling, fold and serve with chutney and sambar.

menu.name: Chettinad Chicken Curry
instructions: Sear chicken pieces in oil and set aside.
Sauté onions until golden, add ginger-garlic and tomatoes; cook to a paste.
Add Chettinad masala, chicken and some water; simmer until chicken is cooked.
Finish with coconut milk, simmer 2 minutes and serve with rice.

menu.name: Medu Vada (Lentil Donut)
instructions: Soak urad dal 4 hours and grind to a thick batter with air incorporated.
Mix chili, ginger, onion and salt into batter.
Shape into doughnut rings and deep fry until golden brown.
Serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

menu.name: Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Saffron strands soaked in 2 tbsp milk
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, biryani masala and herbs for 1 hour.
Par-cook rice with salt and whole spices until 70% done.
Layer rice and chicken in a heavy pot, top with saffron milk, ghee and fried onions.
Dum-cook on low heat 25-30 minutes until fully cooked; fluff and serve with raita.

menu.name: Mutton Korma
instructions: Sear mutton pieces and set aside.
Cook onion paste with ginger-garlic until oil separates.
Add mutton, korma masala and water; simmer until tender.
Stir in yogurt gently and cook 5 more minutes; garnish and serve.

menu.name: Egg Biryani (Half-plate)
instructions: Fry onions until crisp and set aside.
Layer par-cooked rice with halved eggs, fried onions and biryani masala.
Dum-cook 15-20 minutes on low heat until done.
Serve hot with raita and salad.

menu.name: Raita (Cucumber & Mint)
instructions: Whisk yogurt until smooth, fold in cucumber and mint.
Season with salt and roasted cumin powder.
Chill briefly and serve alongside biryani.

menu.name: Quinoa & Roasted Veg Bowl
instructions: Roast veggies with olive oil, salt and pepper until tender.
Assemble quinoa, greens and roasted veggies in a bowl.
Top with hummus and drizzle lemon-tahini dressing; serve.

menu.name: Kale Caesar Salad (Veg)
instructions: Massage kale with a little olive oil and salt to soften.
Toss kale with croutons, parmesan and dressing.
Squeeze lemon over salad and serve chilled.

menu.name: Avocado & Chickpea Wrap
instructions: Mix mashed chickpeas with lemon, salt and pepper.
Spread on wrap, add avocado, lettuce and tomato.
Roll tightly, slice in half and serve.

menu.name: Green Smoothie (Spinach & Apple)
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Adjust sweetness with honey and serve chilled.

menu.name: Tandoori Chicken (Half)
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices and lemon for at least 2 hours.
Grill on high heat (tandoor or oven) until charred and cooked through.
Serve with mint chutney and sliced onions.

menu.name: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Marinate paneer and veggies in yogurt and tikka masala for 30 minutes.
Thread onto skewers and grill until edges are charred.
Serve hot with lemon and chutney.

menu.name: Reshmi Kebab
instructions: Mix all ingredients and refrigerate 30 minutes.
Shape onto skewers and grill until cooked and slightly charred.
Serve with green chutney.

menu.name: Garlic Naan
instructions: Make a soft dough with flour, yogurt and yeast; rest 1 hour.
Roll into naans, brush with garlic butter and bake or char on skillet.
Serve hot with kebabs and curries.

menu.name: Vegetable Chow Mein
instructions: Boil noodles until al dente; drain and toss with a little oil.
Stir-fry vegetables, add noodles and sauces; toss quickly on high heat.
Garnish with green onions and serve.

menu.name: Chicken Pad Thai
ingredients: Pad Thai sauce (tamarind, fish sauce, palm sugar)
instructions: Soak rice noodles until soft.
Stir-fry chicken, push aside and scramble eggs.
Add noodles, sauce, bean sprouts and toss; finish with crushed peanuts.

menu.name: Schezwan Hot Garlic Noodles
instructions: Cook noodles and set aside.
Stir-fry garlic and veggies, add Szechuan sauce and noodles.
Toss well and garnish with spring onions.

menu.name: Tom Yum Soup (Shrimp)
instructions: Boil broth with lemongrass and lime leaves for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms and prawns; cook until prawns turn pink.
Season with fish sauce, lime juice and chili; serve hot.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza (Medium)
instructions: Stretch dough to medium size, spread tomato sauce.
Top with mozzarella and basil, drizzle olive oil.
Bake in hot oven 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.

menu.name: Pepperoni Feast
instructions: Assemble sauce, cheese and pepperoni on dough.
Bake until cheese bubbles and crust browns.
Slice and serve hot.

menu.name: Quattro Formaggi
instructions: Spread cheeses evenly over base.
Bake until cheeses are melted and golden.
Drizzle oil and serve immediately.

menu.name: Garlic Bread (Cheesy)
instructions: Mix butter and crushed garlic; spread on sliced baguette.
Top with mozzarella and bake until cheese melts.
Garnish with parsley and serve warm.

menu.name: Classic Beef Burger
instructions: Season and grill patty to desired doneness.
Toast bun, assemble with lettuce, patty, cheese and sauces.
Serve with fries.

menu.name: Veggie Burger
instructions: Cook veggie patty until crisp.
Assemble on toasted bun with toppings and serve.

menu.name: Chicken BBQ Burger
instructions: Grill chicken with BBQ glaze.
Build burger with coleslaw and onion ring for crunch.
Serve hot with dips.

menu.name: Fries (Seasoned)
instructions: Cut potatoes, soak, dry and deep fry until crisp.
Toss with seasoning and serve immediately.

menu.name: California Roll (8 pcs)
instructions: Spread sushi rice on nori, add crab, avocado and cucumber.
Roll tightly with bamboo mat, slice into 8 pieces.
Sprinkle sesame seeds and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

menu.name: Salmon Nigiri (4 pcs)
instructions: Shape small oval of rice, brush with a little wasabi.
Top with thin slice of salmon and press gently.
Serve immediately with soy sauce.

menu.name: Tempura Prawns (6 pcs)
instructions: Coat prawns in tempura batter and deep fry until crisp.
Drain on paper towel and serve with dipping sauce.

menu.name: Miso Soup
instructions: Heat stock, add tofu and seaweed.
Turn off heat and whisk in miso paste; garnish with spring onions.
Serve warm.

menu.name: Chicken Tacos (3 pcs)
instructions: Warm tortillas, fill with spiced shredded chicken.
Top with onion, cilantro and salsa.
Serve with lime wedges.

menu.name: Beef Burrito
instructions: Layer beef, rice, beans and cheese on tortilla.
Roll tightly and grill seam-side down for 1-2 minutes.
Slice and serve with salsa.

menu.name: Guacamole & Chips
instructions: Mash avocados, mix in chopped veggies and lime juice.
Season and serve with tortilla chips.

menu.name: Churros (Sweet)
instructions: Pipe churro dough into hot oil and fry until golden.
Roll in cinnamon-sugar and serve with chocolate dip.

menu.name: Ribeye Steak (300g)
instructions: Season steak generously and sear on high heat 3-4 minutes each side.
Finish in oven if needed and baste with butter and rosemary.
Rest 5 minutes before slicing and serving.

menu.name: BBQ Pork Ribs (Full)
instructions: Rub ribs with spice mix and slow-cook until tender.
Brush with BBQ sauce and char on grill for glaze.
Slice between bones and serve.

menu.name: Grilled Mushroom Skewers
instructions: Marinate mushrooms in oil, garlic and herbs.
Skewer and grill until tender and slightly charred.
Serve with herb dip.

menu.name: Coleslaw & Corn
instructions: Mix shredded cabbage and carrot with mayo dressing.
Grill corn and brush with butter.
Serve as sides to steak and ribs.

menu.name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Sear chicken, cook tomato-onion base until oil separates.
Add spices and chicken, simmer until cooked.
Finish with butter and cream; garnish with kasuri methi.

menu.name: Dal Tadka
instructions: Cook dal with turmeric until soft.
Prepare tadka with ghee, garlic and spices; pour over dal.
Stir well and serve hot with rice.

menu.name: Aloo Gobi
instructions: Saute onions and tomatoes, add spices.
Add potato and cauliflower, cover and cook until tender.
Garnish with coriander and serve.

menu.name: Jeera Rice
instructions: Heat ghee, fry cumin seeds briefly.
Add soaked rice and water, cook until done.
Fluff with fork and serve with curries.

menu.name: Classic Falafel Wrap
instructions: Prepare falafel and fry until crisp.
Warm pita, fill with falafel, veggies and tahini.
Serve immediately.

menu.name: Hummus Platter
instructions: Blend chickpeas with tahini and lemon to smooth paste.
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle paprika and parsley.
Serve with warm pita.

menu.name: Tabbouleh Salad
instructions: Soak bulgur until tender.
Mix with finely chopped parsley, mint and tomatoes.
Dress with lemon and olive oil and serve chilled.

menu.name: Baba Ganoush
instructions: Scoop roasted eggplant flesh and blend with tahini and garlic.
Season, drizzle olive oil and serve with pita.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter, whisk with eggs and sugar.
Fold in flour and pour into greased molds.
Bake 10-12 minutes until edges are set but center is molten; serve warm.

menu.name: Vanilla Bean Ice Cream (Scoop)
instructions: Prepare custard base with milk, cream and yolks if using.
Churn in ice cream machine or freeze with periodic stirring.
Scoop and serve with toppings.

menu.name: Gulab Jamun (3 pcs)
instructions: Knead dough, shape small balls and deep fry until golden.
Soak in warm sugar syrup for 30 minutes.
Serve warm or chilled.

menu.name: Fruit Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt, fruits and granola in a glass.
Drizzle honey on top and serve chilled.

menu.name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon and seasoning.
Spread on toast, drizzle olive oil and finish with chili flakes.
Serve immediately.

menu.name: Eggs Benedict
instructions: Poach eggs and toast muffins.
Place bacon or salmon on muffin, top with egg and hollandaise.
Serve warm.

menu.name: Pancake Stack (3 pcs)
instructions: Prepare batter, cook pancakes on skillet until golden.
Stack, top with butter and maple syrup.
Serve hot.

menu.name: Fruit & Yogurt Bowl
instructions: Spoon yogurt into bowl, top with fruits and granola.
Drizzle honey and serve chilled.

menu.name: Chicken Shawarma Wrap
instructions: Assemble chicken, sauce and veggies in flatbread.
Roll tightly and grill for 30 seconds to seal.
Serve hot with fries.

menu.name: Paneer Tikka Roll
instructions: Marinate and grill paneer, place in roll with onions and chutney.
Wrap and serve warm.

menu.name: Veggie Roll (Spicy)
instructions: Stir-fry veggies with spices, fill wrap and roll.
Serve with chutney.

menu.name: Cheesy Potato Roll
instructions: Mix mashed potato with seasoning and cheese.
Fill wrap, grill until cheese melts and serve hot.

menu.name: Grilled Veggie Panini
instructions: Layer grilled veggies and cheese on bread, grill in panini press.
Serve hot with a side salad.

menu.name: Lentil & Beetroot Salad
instructions: Toss lentils with beetroot and dressing.
Top with feta and serve chilled.

menu.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Stuff peppers with cooked quinoa and veggies.
Bake until peppers are tender and top melts.
Serve warm.

menu.name: Masala Oats Bowl
instructions: Cook oats with vegetables and spices until done.
Adjust seasoning and serve hot with a lemon wedge.

menu.name: Grilled Chicken Platter
instructions: Grill chicken with BBQ glaze until cooked.
Arrange with salad and lemon; serve hot.

menu.name: Smoky Veg Skewers
instructions: Marinate veggies and paneer, skewer and grill until smoky.
Serve with mint chutney.

menu.name: Pulled Pork Slider (2 pcs)
instructions: Warm pulled pork in BBQ sauce, assemble on slider buns with coleslaw.
Serve warm.

menu.name: Corn on the Cob (BBQ)
instructions: Grill corn and brush with butter and seasoning.
Serve hot as a side.

menu.name: Grilled Lemon Fish
instructions: Marinate fish with lemon, garlic and herbs 15 minutes.
Grill until cooked through and flaky.
Serve with steamed veggies.

menu.name: Prawn Curry (Coastal)
instructions: Sauté base, add spices and prawns; simmer with coconut milk until prawns are cooked.
Serve with rice or appams.

menu.name: Fish Fry (Masala)
instructions: Coat fish in masala and rice flour, shallow fry until crisp.
Serve with lemon and onion rings.

menu.name: Seafood Platter (2 pax)
instructions: Season and grill assorted seafood, arrange on platter with dips.
Serve hot with sides.

menu.name: Cappuccino (Regular)
instructions: Pull espresso, pour steamed milk and top with foam.
Serve hot.

menu.name: Blueberry Muffin
instructions: Mix batter, fold in blueberries and bake in muffin tin until golden.
Cool slightly and serve.

menu.name: Grilled Sandwich (Cheese & Tomato)
instructions: Assemble sandwich with cheese and tomato, butter outside slices.
Grill until golden and cheese melts; serve hot.

menu.name: Iced Latte
instructions: Add espresso to glass with ice, top with cold milk and sweetener if desired.
Stir and serve.

menu.name: Grain Bowl (Millet & Greens)
instructions: Assemble millet and greens, top with seeds and nuts.
Drizzle dressing and serve.

menu.name: Sprout Salad
instructions: Mix sprouts with chopped veggies and seasoning.
Serve chilled as a healthy snack.

menu.name: Beet & Goat Cheese Wrap
instructions: Assemble roasted beet and goat cheese on wrap with arugula.
Roll and serve.

menu.name: Almond & Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth and serve chilled.
